ARS_TEST_TOO_MANY_PROFILES.desc: ARS configuration with more than one profile ARS_PROFILE_LIST table.

ARS_TEST_INTERFACE_INVALID_LINK.desc: Interface configuration with invalid name in ARS_INTERFACE_LIST table.

ARS_TEST_OBJECT_INVALID_MODE.desc: ARS_OBJECT configuration with an invalid value for 'assign_mode'.

ARS_TEST_NEXTHOP_INVALID_IP.desc: Verify nexthop_ip fails validation when an invalid IP address is used.
